summary: Adds the Xivilai race as well as mobs, summons and a follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][/b][i]NOTE: I am no longer responsible for any issues with this mod, I don't play or mod Skyrim anymore, so please refrain from contacting me if you're having issues with this mod, there are forums for that. And for goodness' sake, do not re-upload this mod to the Steam Workshop or anywhere else without my given permission. Thank you for taking your time reading this.[/i][b][b]
[/b]

Introduction[/b]
I am one of the numerous people who has missed the malicious Xivilai from Oblivion. No one has taken the initiative to make such a race for Skyrim, until now. Brace yourselves, now you can finally play as this brute!

This mod aims to bring back Slof's Playable Xivilai from Oblivion to Skyrim, and I wanted to make them look as close to the Oblivion ones as possible.

[b]Features[/b]

[i]Xivilai Race:[/i]
-Racial bonuses and defect such as Daedra Blood as well as an Atronach-like ability, resembling that of the Xivilai from Oblivion.
-With unarmed damage of 25 points, the Xivilai can tear their enemies apart with their claws.
-Power to call upon a Clannfear which levels with you up to 100. This power is set to ignore spell absorbtion so casting it won't fail.
-Tattoo complexions and body tattoo textures made by GendunDrup respective AlienSlof. All the textures included are standalone so installing textures for vanilla races won't affect this race.
-Three different presets for both genders.
-15+ different eyecolors from DorkDiva's elf eye mod. You can even choose to be a blind Xivilai.
-Xivilai apparel (outfit and wig) can be found in one of the rooms in Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood. Also craftable.
-Vampire and Werewolf support
-New scripts that renders the Atronach doomstone useless for this race. This is to prevent the spell absorbtion from stacking to 100%, making the Xivilai pretty much overpowered but also fully unable to use summon spells.

[i]What's new in 666?[/i]
-Xivilai can no longer grow facial hair. On the other hand, you can choose between several kinds of horns via the facial hair slider. I don't recommend installing the latest build of this mod if you're playing an existing character. Your Xivi's look might get messed up...

[i]Summon and Mobs:[/i]
-Conjurable Xivilai. You can buy the spelltome from either Farengar or Phinis.
-Enemy Xivilai among Dremora mobs, especially if you're playing the Oblivion Realms Series.
-Xivilai mobs will drop a random apprentice level conjuration spelltome, including a normal conjurable Clannfear spell. They drop random leveled Dremora weapons as well.

[i]Follower Thrax:[/i]
This plugin adds a standalone male Xivi follower to the Hall of the Dead in Markarth. He levels with you up to 100. He's melee-oriented, marriagable and always has a smug grin on his face. He also shares the same voicetype as Farkas.
PS. The nose chain in one of the pictures is not included. Also, you'll need ApachiiHairMale; http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168

[i]Follower Shist:[/i]
Adds a standalone female Xivi follower to the Solitude catacombs. She also levels up to 100 and is also marriagable.. In combat she relies on destruction magic. ApachiiSkyHair required.
Shist is loosely based on Morella the Cursed; http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19749/


[b]Skill Bonuses[/b]
-Twohanded: 15
-Onehanded: 15
-Smithing: 10
-Destruction: 10
-Conjuration: 10
-Light Armor: 5
-Restoration: 5

[b]Required files[/b]
-Dawnguard
-Better claws for Beast Races - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46895/?
-Any supported body replacers. The main file supports UNP and Sundracon.

For the SOS patch you will need to install Schlongs of Skyrim (Smurf Average version)

[b]Recommended files[/b]
Alternate Start - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?
Subtle Male Skeleton - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34438/?
RaceMenu - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
And mods that add 1h versions of the 2h weapons.

[b]Known issues[/b]
-Characters who have the ability to absorb magicka will fail to cast summon spells most of the time. That's a common issue with self-spells that are not set to ignore spell absorbtion/reflect.
-Custom armors won't show up on this race unless the ArmorAddon has "DefaultRace" highlighted.

[b]Install[/b]
Extract the desired plugins into your Skyrim folder and enable the plugins in Wrye Bash. If you install the "Summon and Mobs" plugin, remember to rebuild your bashed patch.

[b]Compatibility[/b]

Mods that adds hair to the elf races should work on the Xivilai.

[b]Tools used[/b]
GIMP (with .dds plugin)
Fallout Mod Manager
Creation Kit
Wrye Bash
NifSkope

[b]Credits[/b]
-Gendundrup for the detailmaps that I altered.
-Urshi, zzjay and VectorPlexus for the facial/body textures that I modified. Also, thank you bunches Vector for providing me with new mouth meshes with fangs as well as the Atronach doomstone script!
-xs2reality and WolverineHowlett for the body normalmaps. I just tweaked the male one for more compatibility.
-DorkDiva for the eyes.
-TMPhoenix for the RaceCompatibility plugin.
-b3lisario for fixing the SOS addon from being dirty, thank you!
-Dogtown1 for the Clannfear resources.
-nuska for the facial normalmaps and tri's.
-nao4288 for the femalehead tri.
-AlienSlof for the tattoo textures that I ported from her Oblivion mod "Playable Xivilai".
-freakyskull516 for coming up with a name for the female follower.
-Th3Mut4nt for the various howns that I retextured and included here.

The author of Sporty Sexy Map wanted me to link back to their mod from where I used the female body normalmaps, so go check it out; http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13377/?
.

Don't forget to endorse this mod if you liked it, as all kinds of positive feedback encourages me to keep modding!
User screenshots are always welcome! :)[/center]
author: T3alrose and GendunDrup

files.name: Xiv resources
files.changelogHtml:
V1.0 - Initial release
V2.0 - Added female support and minor bugfixes
V3.0 - Managed to add vampire support and set the armor race to default so custom armors should probably work now. No longer requires the "Just For Men" mod.
Added an optitional plugin with a "Conjure Xivilai" spell. You can buy the spelltome from Farengar.
V3.5 - Added more eye colors from DorkDivas elf eye mod, changed the female voice to FemaleElfHaughty and fixed HP regen rate.
V3.9 - Changed the Atronach effect name, fixed decapitated neck parts so they show the right textures. In this version I edited the ARMA for the hands so they rely on the Argonian hand meshes, to give them claws. I coloured the nails black as well.
V4.5 - Made some skintones work. Slof has given me permission to use her Xiv resources in this mod, such as the outfit. I converted it for UNP so far.
V5.0 - Fixed the female world model for the outfit. Added more of DorkDivas amazing elf eyes. Changed the impact sound when fighting unarmed as a Xiv. I've also uploaded the long awaited SOS patch!
V5.5 - Gave the males horns from "Slofs Just For Men"-mod, while the females keep their old ones. Added three different presets for both genders. Increased unarmed damage and reach.
V5.7 - Fixed the non-xivilai complexions displaying the wrong skintone, added new textures to the female horns and made this mod require "Better claws for Beast Races".
V5.9 - Fixed an issue with the UNP body texture. Changed the conjuration power to yield a Clannfear instead of Frost Atronach.
V6.0 - Changed the race description and added a new set of teeth. Added enemy Xiv to the leveled list "LCharDremoraMelee".
V6.0.5 - Disabled some Orc related taunts from enemy Xivilai. Both genders now have separate detail maps (the male one is made by GendunDrup) and new body normalmaps.
V6.1 - Included new scripts provided by my friend VectorPlexus, rendering the Atronach doomstone unuseable for this race. Also fixed Xivilai brutes dropping bows instead of melee weapons. Changed enemy Xivilai voices to "MaleBrute".
V6.5 - Major update. I included tri-files from Nuska's mod "Ethereal Elven Overhaul", darkened the male textures and changed the skintone of the NPC's.
V6.6.6 - Final release (period). Fixed one of the complexion and updated the body textures.
V666 - Tweaked bodytextures and removed the pubix hair. Fixed some complexions displaying the wrong textures. Horns are no longer attached to the headmeshes, you can now choose a set of horns through the facial hair slider. Xivilai can no longer grow beard.
Did a makeover on the Xivi NPC's in the "summon" plugin, to make them more unique.
